name: part_003
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performing 'Circus Panic!!!' on a circus-themed stage with backup dancers.
A storybook-style animated sequence narrated by Sakura Miko, telling the story of a princess from the Flower Kingdom.
Sakura Miko and Shirakami Fubuki performing 'Happy End Princess' on a castle-themed stage.

subtitles.original: さて今日も始めましょうか…
subtitles.english: Well then, shall we begin today as well?

subtitles.original: あ〜、またやっちゃった〜
subtitles.english: Ah, I did it again~

subtitles.original: 実際はご覧の通り、まだまだ未熟な見習いなんです
subtitles.english: As you can see, I'm actually still an inexperienced apprentice.

subtitles.original: 先人に憧れ持って、私もと飛び込んだものの
subtitles.english: Admiring my predecessors, I jumped in too, but...

subtitles.original: 現実はそんな簡単に、上手くいかないなあ…
subtitles.english: Reality isn't that simple, things don't go that smoothly...

subtitles.original: もう一回！怪奇模した喜劇が幕開け
subtitles.english: One more time! The curtain rises on a comedy mimicking the bizarre.

subtitles.original: 一目見ればたちまち虜に
subtitles.english: One look and you'll be instantly captivated.

subtitles.original: え？既にそれさっき見た？
subtitles.english: Eh? You already saw that just now?

subtitles.original: なら、飽き性なあなたにも朗報
subtitles.english: Then, good news for you who gets bored easily.

subtitles.original: ちょっと前の模倣をするだけ
subtitles.english: I'll just imitate what happened a moment ago.

subtitles.original: 繰り返しじゃつまらない！
subtitles.english: Repetition is boring!

subtitles.original: だから、ここから先は趣向を変えてみよう！
subtitles.english: So, let's change things up from here on out!

subtitles.original: ドタバタなサーカスの行方は
subtitles.english: Where this slapstick circus is headed...

subtitles.original: 誰にも自分すらも分からない
subtitles.english: No one knows, not even me.

subtitles.original: 私を選んだ君だけでも楽しんでってよ〜〜〜損させないから
subtitles.english: At least you who chose me, enjoy yourself! I won't let you down.

subtitles.original: いつの日か皆と楽しめるショーがしたいんだよな〜！
subtitles.english: Someday I want to put on a show that everyone can enjoy!

subtitles.original: だからこそ、こんなとこで挫けるわけとかな〜い！
subtitles.english: That's why there's no way I can give up here!

subtitles.original: 言葉なんかじゃ言い表せない
subtitles.english: Words aren't enough to express it,

subtitles.original: あの感動を私もいつか…
subtitles.english: that excitement, someday I too...

subtitles.original: とても偉大なこのステージに
subtitles.english: Whether I'm worthy of this great stage,

subtitles.original: 見合っているか分かんないけれど
subtitles.english: I don't know yet, but...

subtitles.original: 観客全て、私の色で
subtitles.english: I'll dye the entire audience in my color,

subtitles.original: 染め尽くしてやろう
subtitles.english: I'll paint them completely.

subtitles.original: 手始めに、今、眼の前の君たちからいくよ〜〜〜！！！
subtitles.english: For starters, I'm coming for you guys right in front of me now!

subtitles.original: 創造しよう
subtitles.english: Let's create it,

subtitles.original: 華々しいスポットライトの中
subtitles.english: amidst the brilliant spotlight.

subtitles.original: 目を奪うような妙技の数々
subtitles.english: A myriad of eye-catching feats.

subtitles.original: この空間が世界で一番
subtitles.english: This space is the one most worthy

subtitles.original: “娯楽”の名に相応しいんだ！
subtitles.english: of the name 'Entertainment' in the whole world!

subtitles.original: 割れんばかりの歓声と拍手で
subtitles.english: With earth-shattering cheers and applause,

subtitles.original: ショーが終わっていく
subtitles.english: the show comes to an end.

subtitles.original: ああ…これが私が望んだ夢のエンディング
subtitles.english: Ah... this is the dream ending I wished for.

subtitles.original: これは 花の国のお姫様が
subtitles.english: This is the story of when a princess from the Flower Kingdom

subtitles.original: この王国へいらっしゃった時のお話
subtitles.english: came to visit this kingdom.

subtitles.original: まだみんな彼女の事を知らない頃だったので
subtitles.english: Since it was back when no one knew her yet,

subtitles.original: 国民の大半は、アホの子なんて言ってたけど
subtitles.english: most of the citizens called her a 'foolish child', but...

subtitles.original: とっても心優しくそして気さくで
subtitles.english: She was a very kind-hearted, friendly,

subtitles.original: 頼りになるお姫様だったんだよ
subtitles.english: and reliable princess.

subtitles.original: なんてったって、みこはお姫様なんだから！
subtitles.english: After all, Miko is a princess!

subtitles.original: 女神！聖女！英知聡明！慈愛！博愛！
subtitles.english: Goddess! Saint! Wise and Intelligent! Affection! Charity!

subtitles.original: ですわ！
subtitles.english: It is so!

subtitles.original: あたしなんてったってお姫様
subtitles.english: After all, I am a princess.

subtitles.original: この人生におけるヒロイン
subtitles.english: The heroine of this life.

subtitles.original: ですわー！
subtitles.english: It is so!

subtitles.original: 一生遊んでイージーモード
subtitles.english: Playing around my whole life in easy mode,

subtitles.original: って思ったら勝手にどうぞ！
subtitles.english: if that's what you think, go right ahead!

subtitles.original: 世間はいつも風向き次第
subtitles.english: The world is always changing like the wind.

subtitles.original: 有象無象ばかりでホント
subtitles.english: Truly full of riff-raff everywhere.

subtitles.original: 人間不信になっちゃう
subtitles.english: It makes me lose faith in humanity.

subtitles.original: 傷ついたのこの世界に
subtitles.english: I was hurt by the fact that this world

subtitles.original: 血も涙もないこと
subtitles.english: has no blood or tears.

subtitles.original: あれもダメ これもダメ それもダメ どれもダメ
subtitles.english: That's no good, this is no good, that's no good, nothing is good.

subtitles.original: 現実は世知辛い
subtitles.english: Reality is tough.

subtitles.original: 全部改変ですね…
subtitles.english: It's all getting rewritten, isn't it...

subtitles.original: 全部改変ですわー！
subtitles.english: It's all getting rewritten!

subtitles.original: あたしなんてったってお姫様
subtitles.english: After all, I am a princess.

subtitles.original: この人生におけるヒロイン
subtitles.english: The heroine of this life.

subtitles.original: 悲しいシナリオも
subtitles.english: Even the sad scenarios,

subtitles.original: 全部全部書き換えちゃうの
subtitles.english: I'll rewrite them all, every single one.

subtitles.original: だってだって お姫様
subtitles.english: Because, because, I'm a princess.

subtitles.original: 自分の物語くらいは
subtitles.english: At least for my own story,

subtitles.original: キラキラ楽しまなきゃ
subtitles.english: I have to enjoy it sparklingly!

subtitles.original: ですわ ですわ ですわ
subtitles.english: It is so, it is so, it is so!

subtitles.original: 今にみてなさい
subtitles.english: Just you watch.

subtitles.original: 運命なんて
subtitles.english: Destiny and such,

subtitles.original: 改変して差し上げますわー！
subtitles.english: I shall rewrite it for you!

subtitles.original: だれ？だれ？だれだれだれ？
subtitles.english: Who? Who? Who, who, who?

subtitles.original: 裏で糸引いてるのはだれ？
subtitles.english: Who is pulling the strings from behind?

subtitles.original: 操り人形だなんて
subtitles.english: Being a marionette,

subtitles.original: ごめんだわ まったく
subtitles.english: I refuse, honestly.

subtitles.original: 上品な顔してても
subtitles.english: Even with an elegant face,

subtitles.original: 黒幕はあの人かも
subtitles.english: the mastermind might be that person.

subtitles.original: まずはあたしが
subtitles.english: First, I have to,

subtitles.original: 強くならなきゃ
subtitles.english: become stronger.

subtitles.original: 未来は変わらない
subtitles.english: The future won't change.

subtitles.original: 自分改革ですわー！
subtitles.english: It's a self-reformation!

subtitles.original: そうよなんてったってお姫様
subtitles.english: That's right, after all I am a princess.

subtitles.original: あたしこそ最高権力者
subtitles.english: I am the supreme ruler.

subtitles.original: 生涯のすべての
subtitles.english: All of my life's

subtitles.original: 主導権はこちらにあるわ
subtitles.english: initiative lies with me.

subtitles.original: だってだって お姫様
subtitles.english: Because, because, I'm a princess.

subtitles.original: 自分で決めたことくらいは
subtitles.english: At least what I've decided for myself...
